text: @realDonaldTrump With Cuomo just saying NY is over their spike , the attention was on #Massachusetts but Governor Charlie Baker just said “the spurge in mass is no where near what they originally feared” as our new cases are already on a 5 day decline. #covid19  https://t.co/747HBTm3oc
